Package name.pehl.piriti.converter.client

Interface Summary
Converter<T> Simple converter to convert strings into the specified type T and vice versa.
ConverterGinjector  
 

Class Summary
AbstractConverter<T> Base class for all converters with some common functionality.
BooleanConverter Converter for boolean objects.
ByteConverter Converter for byte objects.
CharacterConverter Converter for character objects.
ConverterModule Gin module to bind the ConverterRegistry.
ConverterRegistry Registry with built-in converter.
DateConverter Converter for dates.
DateMS_DateTimeFormat Custom date format to support dates in the following format: /Date(1224043200000)/ Thanks to obesga@gmail.com who contributed this class to Piriti.
DoubleConverter Converter for double objects.
FloatConverter Converter for float objects.
IntegerConverter Converter for integer objects.
LongConverter Converter for long objects.
NoopConverter Noop converter used as default value in annotations.
ObjectConverter Converter for objects.
ShortConverter Converter for short objects.
SqlDateConverter Converter for Date.
TimeConverter Converter for Time.
TimestampConverter Converter for Timestamp.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Convert The custom converter which should be used for the (de)serialization of the JSON / XML value.
